Dear Bill:
This concerns the March lh FAE Dinner and the March 15
Board Meeting in Milwaukee.
Your note indicates NAEB will cover expenses of Radio
Board Members if there are no other ways to obtain them.
My budget is already considerably in the red, so if NAEB
will cover, 1*11 be glad to attend. Matter of fact, as
I*ve never attended a recent Board Meeting 1*11 welcome an
opportunity to get acquainted. How is this handled~by subÂ¬
mitting a travel voucher?.and to whom? And is transportation
tax exempt?
Sincerely,
Director, WSUI-KSUI
